detail_desc: Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic sidepieces and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues down each short side. Unlined. Size 6x10.5x18.5 cm.
Knee-length jersey dress with raglan cap sleeves, a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, lined hood with appliqués, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved blouse in softly draping silk with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.

Bootees in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Elastication at the back of the heels and a hook and loop fastening at the front of the shaft. Soft fleece linings and insoles and soft soles. The bootees have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and jersey trims around the hood, pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck opening at the front.

Short-sleeved jumpsuit in a patterned weave with a deep V-neck at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and wide, gently flared legs. Lined. The polyester content of the jumpsuit is partly recycled.
Short-sleeved wrap dress in woven fabric with flounces. V-neck, a concealed hook-and-eye at the top and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep V-neck at the front and wide shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Parka woven in a modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, diagonal zip down the front, a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and long sleeves with a tab and button. Unlined.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Nightdress in jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with triangular, lace-trimmed cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Sleeveless dress in an airy linen and cotton weave with buttons down the front and a smocked back. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Body in lace with a cut-out section at the front and a super push-up bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and medium coverage at the back.

Non-wired push-up bra designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist and tasselled trim at the hem. Unlined.
Short, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with short sleeves, buttons down the front and gathered seams at the waist and hem for added width. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in satin with a lace yoke and a round neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.

Set with a shirt and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a gently rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and fastening at the back. Short shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Detachable elastic braces.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Set with a dress and leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Dress with long sleeves, a seam at the top and gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge, loop at the back, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front. Mesh linings and insoles.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline. Roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with terry hearts on the front and sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a motif on the front, slits in the sides and ribbing at the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
All-in-one suit in marled, fine-knit thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and raglan sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in striped cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with elastication at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with smocked trims and a seam at the waist. Unlined.

Set with a dress and leggings in cotton. Long-sleeved dress in soft denim with buttons at the top, a chest pocket, buttoned cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Patterned jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Boots in imitation suede with round toes and fringes decorated with faceted plastic stones. Fabric linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8.5 cm.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, boat neck, long sleeves and elastication at the sides. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Windbreaker in a crisp weave made from a nylon blend with a stand-up collar and drawstring. Hood that can be folded, concealed and zipped inside the collar, a zip down the front and mesh-lined side pockets. Long sleeves with a tab and adjustable fastening at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Mesh lining.
Straight-cut top in woven fabric in a double layer with a wide flounce at the top.
Jacquard-patterned sports vest top in fast-drying jersey.
Double-layered hat in fine-knit wool with a small imitation leather appliqué at the hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar with a chin guard and a zip and wind flap with a hook and loop fastening down the front. Fake pockets at the top, flap patch pockets with a press-stud, and a small single back vent. Lined.
Jersey T-shirt in a cotton and modal blend with embroidered text at the neckline.

Striped shirt in a soft poplin made from a viscose blend in a straight cut with a gently tapered waist. Turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides.
Chino shorts in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.

Long, sleeveless dress in pleated jersey. Round neckline and an opening with a decorative bar-shaped metal bead at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a raw-edge hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Single-breasted jacket in a checked cotton weave with narrow notch lapels and two buttons at the front. Flap front pockets, one inner pocket, concealed buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Short skirt in imitation patent leather with a tab and press-studs at the top and a visible zip at the front. Lined.
Bolero in a soft fine knit containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in woven fabric with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and slits at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short-sleeved wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the side and crotch.
Long-sleeved, knee-length dress in stretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover and V-neck opening at the front. Seam under the bust and a detachable tie belt. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Fitted jersey T-shirt in a soft viscose and cotton blend with embroidery and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Pyjama bottoms in lightweight fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Eleven pairs of studs and one pair of earrings with fabric tassels. Size from 0.2 cm to 4 cm.
Fitted off-the-shoulder top in cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a lace-covered V-neck at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Cropped top in a crinkled weave with a round neckline and voluminous balloon sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Partly open back with ties at the back of the hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Low waist with wide elastication, and a high cut at the back.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with notch lapels, buttons down the front and short sleeves. Open chest pocket and a gathered seam with a sewn-in tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim in a slightly looser fit with a high waist, button fly and straight legs.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.
